theory.brief: Ôn tập: (1) Past Continuous: was/were + V-ing, dùng cho hành động đang xảy ra khi hành động khác xen vào (Past Simple). (2) Used to + V: thói quen/tình trạng trong quá khứ không còn nữa. (3) Will/Won't: dự đoán, quyết định tức thời. (4) Be going to: kế hoạch đã định hoặc dự đoán có bằng chứng.
examples: I was watching TV when the phone rang.
I used to play football every day when I was young.
It will rain tomorrow. / I'll help you!
I'm meeting my friends at 7pm tonight.
Look at those clouds! It's going to rain.

exercises.question: I __________ TV when the phone rang.
exercises.explanation: Past Continuous cho hành động đang xảy ra khi hành động khác xen vào

exercises.question: She __________ to play the piano when she was young.
exercises.explanation: 'used to' + verb cho thói quen trong quá khứ
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: I think it __________ rain tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: 'will' cho dự đoán (I think...)

exercises.question: Look at those clouds! It __________ rain.
exercises.explanation: 'be going to' cho dự đoán có bằng chứng (clouds)
hints: Có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.question: We __________ dinner with our friends tonight.
exercises.explanation: Present Continuous cho kế hoạch đã sắp xếp trong tương lai
hints: Kế hoạch đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.question: While I __________, my brother was playing games.
exercises.explanation: Hai hành động đang xảy ra song song trong quá khứ → cả hai dùng Past Continuous

exercises.question: He __________ live in the countryside, but now he lives in the city.
exercises.explanation: 'used to' cho tình trạng trong quá khứ không còn nữa
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: Don't worry, I __________ help you with your homework.
exercises.explanation: 'will' cho quyết định tức thời
hints: Quyết định ngay lúc nói → will

exercises.question: What __________ you doing at 8 o'clock last night?
exercises.explanation: you + were + V-ing

exercises.question: She __________ meet her friends tomorrow. They've already made plans.
exercises.explanation: 'be going to' cho kế hoạch đã định trước
hints: Kế hoạch đã định → be going to

exercises.question: When I arrived, everyone __________.
exercises.explanation: everyone + were sleeping (chỉ nhiều người)
hints: Past Continuous khi hành động khác xen vào

exercises.question: Did you __________ have a pet when you were a child?
exercises.explanation: Trong câu hỏi với 'did', dùng 'use to' (không có d)

exercises.question: I promise I __________ be late again.
exercises.explanation: 'won't' cho lời hứa

exercises.question: What time __________ the movie starting tonight?
exercises.explanation: Present Continuous cho sự kiện đã được lên lịch

exercises.question: The teacher __________ when the student entered the classroom.
exercises.explanation: Past Continuous cho hành động đang diễn ra khi hành động khác xen vào

exercises.question: My grandmother __________ tell us stories every night.
exercises.explanation: 'used to' cho thói quen trong quá khứ
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: A: The phone's ringing! B: I __________ answer it.
exercises.explanation: Quyết định tức thời → will
hints: Quyết định ngay lúc nói → will

exercises.question: Be careful! You __________ fall!
exercises.explanation: Dự đoán có bằng chứng hiện tại → be going to
hints: Có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.question: I __________ my friend at the mall tomorrow at 3pm.
exercises.explanation: Kế hoạch cụ thể đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous
hints: Đã sắp xếp cụ thể → Present Continuous

exercises.question: What __________ you doing when I called you?
exercises.explanation: you + were + V-ing

exercises.question: I __________ (watch) TV when the lights went out.
acceptedAnswers: was watching

exercises.question: She __________ (use) to live in Paris.
acceptedAnswers: used
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: I think it __________ (be) sunny tomorrow.
acceptedAnswers: will be
'll be

exercises.question: We __________ (go) to visit our grandparents next weekend. We bought the tickets.
acceptedAnswers: are going to go
're going to go
are going
hints: Kế hoạch đã định → be going to

exercises.question: I __________ (have) dinner with Tom tonight at 7pm.
acceptedAnswers: am having
'm having
hints: Kế hoạch đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.question: While she __________ (cook), her husband was cleaning the house.
acceptedAnswers: was cooking

exercises.question: He didn't __________ (use) to like vegetables.
acceptedAnswers: use

exercises.question: I promise I __________ (not forget) your birthday.
acceptedAnswers: won't forget
will not forget

exercises.question: Look! The bus __________ (leave) soon!
acceptedAnswers: is going to leave
's going to leave
is leaving
hints: Dự đoán có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.question: What __________ (you/do) at 9pm last night?
acceptedAnswers: were you doing

exercises.wrongSentence: I was watch TV when she called.
exercises.correctSentence: I was watching TV when she called.
exercises.explanation: Past Continuous: was/were + V-ing

exercises.wrongSentence: He use to play football every day.
exercises.correctSentence: He used to play football every day.
exercises.explanation: Câu khẳng định dùng 'used to' (có d)

exercises.correctSentence: Look! It is going to rain!
exercises.explanation: Có bằng chứng hiện tại → be going to
hints: Look! = có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.wrongSentence: I am meet my friends tomorrow.
exercises.correctSentence: I am meeting my friends tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: Present Continuous: am/is/are + V-ing

exercises.wrongSentence: Did you used to live here?
exercises.correctSentence: Did you use to live here?
exercises.explanation: Sau 'did', dùng 'use to' (không có d)

exercises.wrongSentence: While I studied, my phone rang.
exercises.correctSentence: While I was studying, my phone rang.
exercises.explanation: While + Past Continuous

exercises.wrongSentence: I think it is going to rain tomorrow.
exercises.correctSentence: I think it will rain tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: 'I think' + will cho dự đoán

exercises.wrongSentence: She was sleeping when I was arriving.
exercises.correctSentence: She was sleeping when I arrived.
exercises.explanation: Hành động xen vào dùng Past Simple

exercises.wrongSentence: We going to visit Paris next month.
exercises.correctSentence: We are going to visit Paris next month.
exercises.explanation: be going to: cần động từ 'be'

exercises.wrongSentence: I willn't tell anyone your secret.
exercises.correctSentence: I won't tell anyone your secret.
exercises.explanation: will not = won't

exercises.question: They __________ soccer when it started to rain.
exercises.explanation: Past Continuous cho hành động đang xảy ra khi hành động khác xen vào

exercises.question: There __________ be a park here, but now there's a shopping mall.
exercises.explanation: 'used to' cho tình trạng không còn nữa
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: I'm sure she __________ pass the exam. She's very smart.
exercises.explanation: Dự đoán với 'I'm sure' → will

exercises.question: Watch out! You __________ hit that car!
exercises.explanation: Dự đoán có bằng chứng → be going to
hints: Có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.question: What __________ you doing this weekend?
exercises.explanation: Hỏi về kế hoạch → Present Continuous

exercises.question: When I __________ home, my mom was cooking dinner.
exercises.explanation: Hành động xen vào dùng Past Simple

exercises.question: My father __________ smoke, but he stopped 5 years ago.
exercises.explanation: Thói quen trong quá khứ không còn nữa
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: It's cold. I __________ close the window.
exercises.explanation: Quyết định tức thời → will
hints: Quyết định ngay lúc nói → will

exercises.question: We __________ visit our grandparents next Sunday. We've already told them.
exercises.explanation: Kế hoạch đã định trước → be going to
hints: Đã thông báo = đã lên kế hoạch → be going to

exercises.question: She __________ English at the university next year.
exercises.explanation: Kế hoạch tương lai đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: I / was / watching / TV / when / the / phone / rang
exercises.correctSentence: I was watching TV when the phone rang
acceptedAnswers: I was watching TV when the phone rang
I was watching TV when the phone rang.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: She / used / to / live / in / London
exercises.correctSentence: She used to live in London
acceptedAnswers: She used to live in London
She used to live in London.
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: I / think / it / will / rain / tomorrow
exercises.correctSentence: I think it will rain tomorrow
acceptedAnswers: I think it will rain tomorrow
I think it will rain tomorrow.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: Look / at / those / clouds / It / is / going / to / rain
exercises.correctSentence: Look at those clouds It is going to rain
acceptedAnswers: Look at those clouds It is going to rain
Look at those clouds. It is going to rain.
Look at those clouds! It is going to rain!
hints: Có bằng chứng → is going to

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: We / are / meeting / our / friends / tonight
exercises.correctSentence: We are meeting our friends tonight
acceptedAnswers: We are meeting our friends tonight
We are meeting our friends tonight.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: While / she / was / sleeping / I / was / reading
exercises.correctSentence: While she was sleeping I was reading
acceptedAnswers: While she was sleeping I was reading
While she was sleeping, I was reading

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: Did / you / use / to / play / tennis?
exercises.correctSentence: Did you use to play tennis
acceptedAnswers: Did you use to play tennis
Did you use to play tennis?

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: I / promise / I / will / help / you
exercises.correctSentence: I promise I will help you
acceptedAnswers: I promise I will help you
I promise I will help you.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: What / were / you / doing / at / 8pm?
exercises.correctSentence: What were you doing at 8pm
acceptedAnswers: What were you doing at 8pm
What were you doing at 8pm?

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: We / are / going / to / visit / Paris / next / month
exercises.correctSentence: We are going to visit Paris next month
acceptedAnswers: We are going to visit Paris next month
We are going to visit Paris next month.
hints: be going to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: He __________ breakfast when I called him.
exercises.explanation: Past Continuous cho hành động đang xảy ra

exercises.question: __________ you use to walk to school?
exercises.explanation: Câu hỏi với 'used to' dùng 'Did'

exercises.question: I __________ probably be late tonight.
exercises.explanation: 'probably' + will cho dự đoán

exercises.question: She __________ a baby in June.
exercises.explanation: Sự kiện đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.question: This time yesterday, I __________ on the beach.
exercises.explanation: 'This time yesterday' → Past Continuous
hints: This time + thời gian quá khứ → Past Continuous

exercises.question: My sister __________ be afraid of dogs, but now she loves them.
exercises.explanation: Tình trạng trong quá khứ không còn nữa
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: The train __________ at 9 o'clock tomorrow morning.
exercises.explanation: Lịch trình cá nhân → Present Continuous
hints: Kế hoạch đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.question: I don't think she __________ come to the party.
exercises.explanation: I don't think + will cho dự đoán

exercises.question: While I __________ the house, I found an old photo.
exercises.explanation: While + Past Continuous

exercises.question: Look at that car! It __________ crash!
exercises.explanation: Dự đoán có bằng chứng → be going to
hints: Look! = có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.question: They __________ (play) in the garden when it started raining.
acceptedAnswers: were playing

exercises.question: He __________ (not use) to like vegetables.
acceptedAnswers: didn't use
did not use

exercises.question: I think they __________ (win) the match.
acceptedAnswers: will win
'll win

exercises.question: She __________ (fly) to London tomorrow. She has the tickets.
acceptedAnswers: is flying
's flying
hints: Đã có vé = đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.question: What __________ (she/do) when you saw her?
acceptedAnswers: was she doing

exercises.question: We __________ (not go) to the party tonight. We're too tired.
acceptedAnswers: aren't going
are not going
're not going

exercises.question: He __________ (use) to be very shy.
acceptedAnswers: used
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: I __________ (not tell) anyone. I promise!
acceptedAnswers: won't tell
will not tell

exercises.question: Look! The baby __________ (cry). Pick her up!
acceptedAnswers: is going to cry
's going to cry
is crying
hints: Có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.question: At this time last week, we __________ (swim) in the sea.
acceptedAnswers: were swimming
hints: At this time last week → Past Continuous

exercises.question: I __________ a book when the doorbell rang.
exercises.explanation: Past Continuous cho hành động đang xảy ra

exercises.question: We __________ live in a small village when I was a child.
exercises.explanation: Tình trạng trong quá khứ
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.question: Don't worry, everything __________ be fine.
exercises.explanation: Động viên/an ủi → will

exercises.question: I __________ my dentist at 3pm tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: Cuộc hẹn đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.question: The children __________ in the pool when it started to thunder.
exercises.explanation: Past Continuous cho hành động đang xảy ra

exercises.question: She didn't __________ have long hair.
exercises.explanation: Sau didn't dùng 'use to' (không có d)

exercises.question: I'm hungry. I __________ make a sandwich.
exercises.explanation: Quyết định tức thời → will
hints: Quyết định ngay lúc nói → will

exercises.question: We __________ to Spain next summer. We've booked the hotel.
exercises.explanation: Đã đặt khách sạn = đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.question: At 7pm yesterday, I __________ dinner.
exercises.explanation: At + thời điểm cụ thể trong quá khứ → Past Continuous

exercises.question: Look! He __________ fall off the ladder!
exercises.explanation: Dự đoán có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.vietnamese: Tôi đang xem TV thì điện thoại reo.
exercises.answer: I was watching TV when the phone rang.
acceptedAnswers: I was watching TV when the phone rang.
I was watching TV when the phone rang

exercises.vietnamese: Anh ấy từng sống ở Paris.
exercises.answer: He used to live in Paris.
acceptedAnswers: He used to live in Paris.
He used to live in Paris
hints: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu

exercises.vietnamese: Tôi nghĩ ngày mai trời sẽ mưa.
exercises.answer: I think it will rain tomorrow.
acceptedAnswers: I think it will rain tomorrow.
I think it will rain tomorrow
I think it's going to rain tomorrow.
I think it's going to rain tomorrow

exercises.vietnamese: Nhìn những đám mây kia! Trời sắp mưa!
exercises.answer: Look at those clouds! It's going to rain!
acceptedAnswers: Look at those clouds! It's going to rain!
Look at those clouds! It is going to rain!
Look at those clouds. It's going to rain.
hints: Có bằng chứng → be going to

exercises.vietnamese: Chúng tôi sẽ gặp bạn bè tối nay.
exercises.answer: We are meeting our friends tonight.
acceptedAnswers: We are meeting our friends tonight.
We are meeting our friends tonight
We're meeting our friends tonight.
hints: Kế hoạch đã sắp xếp → Present Continuous

exercises.vietnamese: Bạn đang làm gì lúc 8 giờ tối qua?
exercises.answer: What were you doing at 8 o'clock last night?
acceptedAnswers: What were you doing at 8 o'clock last night?
What were you doing at 8 o'clock last night
What were you doing at 8pm last night?

exercises.answer: She used to be afraid of dogs.
acceptedAnswers: She used to be afraid of dogs.
She used to be afraid of dogs
She used to be scared of dogs.

exercises.vietnamese: Tôi hứa tôi sẽ không nói với ai.
exercises.answer: I promise I won't tell anyone.
acceptedAnswers: I promise I won't tell anyone.
I promise I won't tell anyone
I promise I will not tell anyone.

exercises.vietnamese: Chúng tôi sẽ đi thăm ông bà vào tuần tới.
exercises.answer: We are going to visit our grandparents next week.
acceptedAnswers: We are going to visit our grandparents next week.
We are going to visit our grandparents next week
We're going to visit our grandparents next week.
hints: Kế hoạch đã định → be going to

exercises.vietnamese: Trong khi tôi đang nấu ăn, chồng tôi đang dọn nhà.
exercises.answer: While I was cooking, my husband was cleaning the house.
acceptedAnswers: While I was cooking, my husband was cleaning the house.
While I was cooking, my husband was cleaning the house
While I was cooking my husband was cleaning the house
